text: Dival Forele Malonga Dzalamou (born April 18, 1995) is a boxer from the Republic of the Congo. He competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in the men's light welterweight event, in which he was eliminated in the first round by Fazliddin Gaibnazarov. ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Republic of the Congo male boxers Category:Olympic boxers of the Republic of the Congo Category:Boxers at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Light-welterweight boxers
title: Dival Malonga
